languages.text: "Пусть Экклезиархия умерит аппетит. Пусть борются с инакомыслием там, где это не грозит бунтом".
"The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."
languages.original_text: "Пусть Экклезиархия умерит аппетит. Пусть борются с инакомыслием там, где это не грозит бунтом".

traits.locale_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."
"The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."
"The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

"The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."
"The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

languages.text: “国教的人得克制一下他们的胃口，他们应该去不会爆发骚乱的地方打击异端分子。”
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

traits.locale_text: “国教的人得克制一下他们的胃口，他们应该去不会爆发骚乱的地方打击异端分子。”

languages.text: «La Eclesiarquía debería controlar su apetito. Deberían ir a luchar contra la disidencia a algún sitio donde no acabe en disturbios».
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

traits.locale_text: «La Eclesiarquía debería controlar su apetito. Deberían ir a luchar contra la disidencia a algún sitio donde no acabe en disturbios».

languages.text: 「帝国聖教会はその欲を抑えるべきだ。暴動で終わらないようなところで、先頭に立って反対派と戦わねばならない」
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国聖教会はその欲を抑えるべきだ。暴動で終わらないようなところで、先頭に立って反対派と戦わねばならない」

languages.text: « L'Ecclésiarchie ferait mieux de calmer son appétit et de combattre les dissidents là où cela ne risque pas de se terminer en émeutes. »
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

traits.locale_text: « L'Ecclésiarchie ferait mieux de calmer son appétit et de combattre les dissidents là où cela ne risque pas de se terminer en émeutes. »

languages.text: "Die Ekklesiarchie sollte ihre Gier zügeln. Sie sollten dort gegen den Dissens kämpfen, wo er nicht zu Aufständen führt."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ekklesiarchie sollte ihre Gier zügeln. Sie sollten dort gegen den Dissens kämpfen, wo er nicht zu Aufständen führt."

languages.text: "Ekleşiarşi'nin arzularını dizginlemesi gerekecek. Gidip isyanlarla sonlanmayacak bir yerde karşıt görüşlerle savaşsınlar."
languages.original_text: "The Ecclesiarchy should curb their appetite. They should go fight against dissent somewhere where it will not end in riots."
